title: The Wall Street Journal: Bon-Ton to close its remaining department stores, putting 24,000 out of work
text:
Department-store operator Bon-Ton Stores Inc. will begin closing down its remaining stores and go out of business after a bankruptcy judge said she would approve the sale of the retailerâ€™s assets.
Judge Mary Walrath of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Wilmington, Del., Wednesday cleared the way for a sale to a group of bondholders and a pair of liquidators, which will begin closing more than 250 stores across 23 states, putting about 24,000 employees out of work.
...
